verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. Maschil of David; when Doeg the Edomite came and told Saul, and said unto him, David is come to the house of Ahimelech. Why boastest <S%H1984><s%> thou thyself in mischief <S%H7451><s%>, O mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H2617><s%>? The lovingkindness of God <S%H410><s%> endureth continually <S%H3117><s%>.
Thy tongue <S%H3956><s%> deviseth <S%H2803><s%> very wickedness <S%H1942><s%>, Like a sharp <S%H3913><s%> razor <S%H8593><s%>, working <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully <S%H7423><s%>.
Thou lovest <S%H157><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> more than good <S%H2896><s%>, And lying <S%H8267><s%> rather than to speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Thou lovest <S%H157><s%> all devouring <S%H1105><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>, O thou deceitful <S%H4820><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

God <S%H410><s%> will likewise destroy <S%H5422><s%> thee for ever <S%H5331><s%>; He will take thee up <S%H2846><s%>, and pluck thee out <S%H5255><s%> of thy tent <S%H168><s%>, And root thee out <S%H8327><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3372><s%>, and fear, And shall laugh at him <S%H7832><s%>, saying,

Lo <S%H1397><s%>, this is the man that made <S%H7760><s%> not God <S%H430><s%> his strength <S%H4581><s%>, But trusted <S%H982><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of his riches <S%H6239><s%>, And strengthened <S%H5810><s%> himself in his wickedness <S%H1942><s%>.

But as for me <S%H7488><s%>, I am like a green olive-tree <S%H2132><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: I trust <S%H982><s%> in the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>.

I will give thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, because thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H6960><s%>; And I will hope in thy name <S%H8034><s%>, for it is good <S%H2896><s%>, in the presence of thy saints <S%H2623><s%>.
